item.title: How to Learn Languages
item.description: It’s pretty crazy to think that when I landed in Taiwan I could not even say “thank you”, yet fast forward 6 years and I’m giving presentations in Chinese every week to my Taiwanese labmates. So how is this possible? I thought I would share a couple of tips I’ve learned and shed light on what I’ve gone through. Classes Should Not Be The Primary Way You Learn In 2016-2017 I went to Chinese classes every day for 2-3 hours, after which I usually went to the library to work on homework or to learn some new characters.
